data.oai_dc:dc: Kapp Norvegia Antarctic Slope Front climatology

Hydrographic sections across the Antarctic Slope Front at Kapp Norvegia, at about 71S 17W. Gridded monthly mean climatologies were constructed by mapping and avereaging along isobaths of available ship-based and seal (meop.net) CTD data from 1977 to 2016 between 10W and 25W. See Hattermann (2018), Antarctic thermocline dynamics along a narrow shelf with easterly winds, JPO, for further details.
Filchner Ice Shelf Project, FISP, KappNorvegia, Kapp Norvegia, MULT, Multiple investigations
